en.DONATIONS_URGENT_MESSAGE: URGENT: We need your support now for 12 puppies rescued this week
en.DONATIONS_SUBTITLE: Each donation brings us one step closer to a world where no animal suffers abandonment or abuse.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_SUBTITLE: Your financial contribution is vital to maintain our rescues and veterinary care.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_USAGE_VET_TEXT: Vaccines, deworming, sterilization, and medical treatments for rescued animals.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_USAGE_FOOD_TEXT: Quality food for all animals under our care.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_USAGE_SHELTER_TEXT: Maintenance of facilities, beds, blankets, and hygiene items.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_BANK_TEXT: Transfer your donation to the savings account:
en.MONETARY_DONATION_PAYPAL_TEXT: Scan the following QR code to donate:
en.MONETARY_DONATION_FORM_MESSAGE_PLACEHOLD: Would you like to leave us a message?
en.MONETARY_DONATION_NEQUI_INSTR_2: 2. Select "Send" and send your donation to the number:
en.MONETARY_DONATION_NEQUI_INSTR_3: 3. Take a screenshot of the receipt
en.MONETARY_DONATION_NEQUI_INSTR_4: 4. Complete this form and submit it
en.MONETARY_DONATION_NEQUI_INSTR_5: 5. Upload the receipt in the next step
en.MONETARY_DONATION_BANK_INSTR_1: 1. Make a transfer to the savings account:
en.MONETARY_DONATION_BANK_INSTR_4: 4. Complete this form and submit it
en.MONETARY_DONATION_BANK_INSTR_5: 5. Upload the receipt in the next step
en.MONETARY_DONATION_PAYPAL_INSTR_1: 1. Scan the QR code with your PayPal app or visit our donation link
en.MONETARY_DONATION_PAYPAL_INSTR_3: 3. Save the receipt or take a screenshot
en.MONETARY_DONATION_PAYPAL_INSTR_4: 4. Complete this form and submit it
en.MONETARY_DONATION_PAYPAL_INSTR_5: 5. Upload the receipt in the next step
en.MONETARY_DONATION_EVIDENCE_TEXT: Please upload an image or screenshot of your donation receipt.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_SUCCESS_TEXT: Your donation has been successfully registered. Would you like to upload a payment receipt?
en.MONETARY_DONATION_THANKS_TEXT: Your generosity helps us continue rescuing and caring for animals in need.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_EVIDENCE_SUCCESS_TEXT: Thank you for sending your receipt. Your donation will be verified soon.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_ERROR_PROCESSING: Error processing the donation. Please try again.
en.MONETARY_DONATION_ERROR_EVIDENCE: Error uploading the receipt. Please try again.
en.FOOD_DONATION_SUBTITLE: Help feed our rescued animals with quality food.
en.FOOD_DONATION_DOG_TEXT: Dry or wet food for adult dogs.
en.FOOD_DONATION_CAT_TEXT: Dry or wet food for adult cats.
en.FOOD_DONATION_SHELTER_ADDRESS: Address: carrera 5 calle 8a #04, barrio guillermo escobar
en.FOOD_DONATION_SHELTER_HOURS: Reception hours: Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
en.FOOD_DONATION_MAP_TEXT: If the map doesn't load correctly, you can open our location in:

en.FOOD_DONATION_REMOTE_INFO: For donations from other cities, you can send food to our address:
en.FOOD_DONATION_REMOTE_ADDRESS: Address: carrera 5 calle 8a #04, barrio guillermo escobar
en.FOOD_DONATION_REMOTE_NAME: To the name of: Monta√±ita Adopta
en.FOOD_DONATION_SUCCESS_TEXT: Your food donation has been successfully registered. We will contact you soon to coordinate the details.
en.DONATION_LOGIN_REQUIRED: You must be logged in to register a donation
